articles.title: Former NFL player Doug Martin died after struggling with officers while being detained, police say
articles.description:
Martin, best known for his stellar career with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, became unresponsive after being arrested early Saturday, according to a statement released by the Oakland Police Department.

The post Former NFL player Doug Martin died after struggling with officers while being detained, police say appeared first on Boston.com.
